cont.entity_a: Marvel chipset has a bug causing network crashes with Android devices. 2.4GHz band stops broadcasting, requiring frequent reboots. 5GHz band has instability issues. Frequent disconnections and reboots required. 5GHz band drops after one year of use. Frequent reboots needed to maintain connection.
cont.entity_b: Frequent VPN drops and connection issues. Dual WAN option works inconsistently. VPN functionality is limited. Load balancing doesn't work with secure connections. Port forwarding limitations exist. Issues with load balancing and incoming traffic. VPN connections drop frequently.

cont.entity_a: Easily modifiable firmware for VPN integration. Supports DD-WRT and NordVPN for network security. Stock firmware issues resolved with DD-WRT. Newer model incompatible with DD-WRT. Lacks firmware updates, affecting performance. Firmware update caused frequent Wi-Fi drops.
Economical alternative to expensive routers with open-source programming.
The router has excellent Wi-Fi coverage and speed. Signal range improved over previous models. Good Wi-Fi signal but lacks dual frequency separation.
Customer service sent a replacement product. Poor tech support and security issues.
Setup wizard had issues resolving IP on static WAN link. Easy setup with OpenWRT firmware.
cont.entity_b: Setup is intuitive with easy NAT and VPN configuration. Suitable for smaller installations with easy configuration.

cont.entity_a: Lacks advanced features and user control. MUMIMO support enhances device connectivity.
cont.entity_b: Strong firewall and robust VPN capabilities. Effective for load balancing with multiple DSL lines. Load balance works well with multiple connections. Recommended for small businesses needing VPN and load balancing.

cont.entity_a: Runs hot, causing emissions and discomfort. Overheats due to missing cooling fan.
cont.entity_b: Device gets hot and requires good ventilation.

cont.entity_a: KRACK fix unavailable; LEDE driver has connectivity issues. Known KRACK vulnerability remains unfixed.
Factory box was unsealed, lacking startup disk.

cont.entity_b: Product not compatible with VOIP systems.
